translation.en: Dad, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 爸爸！你在做什么呢？

translation.en: Oh, uh, just makin' a movie. [Julia] Why?
translation.zh:
-我只是在录像
-为什么？

translation.en: [man] So we can remember. A day in the life.
translation.zh: 这样我们就能记住生命中的一天

translation.en: [laughing] This is awesome!
translation.zh: 真是太棒了！

translation.en: What a day to remember!
translation.zh: 真是值得记住的一天！

translation.en: The excitement was squishable
translation.zh: “到处是兴奋的欢呼

translation.en: as the entire garden gathered to witness an amazing feat.
translation.zh:
因为整个花园的伙伴都聚在一起
见证一场惊人的技艺表演：

translation.en: An attempt to break the bug speed record.
translation.zh: 尝试打破虫速纪录”

translation.en: I love breaking stuff!
translation.zh: 我喜欢打破东西！

translation.en: Oh, with my, uh, custom-made cricktoracer,
translation.zh: 借助我定制的克里克赛车

translation.en: you should go faster than any bug has ever gone before!
translation.zh: 你会比以往任何虫子跑得都快！

translation.en: Let's do this!
translation.zh: 我们开始吧！

translation.en: Talk us through what you're doing here, Crick, in laybug's terms.
translation.zh:
克里克 用通俗点的虫话
跟我们说说你都做了什么

translation.en: Ah! Well, I've installed a warning light, uh, so when Jay reaches record-breaking speed,
translation.zh:
哦 我安装了警示灯
所以当杰伊达到破纪录的速度时

translation.en: it will, uh, flash and the cricktocamera will cricktomatically take a picture.
translation.zh:
它就会闪烁 克里克相机
就会克里克自动拍下照片

translation.en: Enough talking! Time for Jaction! That's Jay plus action!
translation.zh:
说够了 该杰动了！
就是杰伊加行动！

translation.en: -[engine revving] -Kumi to Buzz. Kumi to Buzz.
translation.zh: 库米呼叫巴兹

translation.en: [through radio] Kumi to Buzz, do you read? [Buzz] Wow.
translation.zh:
-请回答 巴兹 收到了吗？
-哇哦！

translation.en: Kumi to Buzz, do you read? Oh! Um, I'm learning to read. Does that count?
translation.zh:
-请回答 巴兹 收到了吗？
-我正在学怎么收 这算吗？

translation.en: Sure, Buzz. Ah, Jay's about to go. Just checking that the coast is clear.
translation.zh:
当然 巴兹 杰伊就要出发了
我只是要看看道路是否畅通

translation.en: -Yes, the clear is coast! -[meows]
translation.zh: 是的！畅通很道路！

translation.en: Okay, we are good to go!
translation.zh: 好的！ 我们准备好出发了！

translation.en: Oh, my. I've got a bad feeling about this. I can't... I can't watch.
translation.zh:
哦 天呐 我有种不祥的预感
我看不下去了

translation.en: Now to make sure that record stays broken!
translation.zh: 现在该保证这个记录要继续破下去了

translation.en: Um, Buzz to Kumi. Buzz to Kumi. The clear is not coast anymore!
translation.zh: 巴兹呼叫库米！ 畅通不再道路了！

translation.en: Uh, Buzz, what do you mean?
translation.zh: 巴兹 你是什么意思？

translation.en: -Jay! -[bugs gasp]
translation.zh: 杰伊！

translation.en: Jay! Are you okay?
translation.zh: 杰伊！ 你还好吗？

translation.en: I am, uh, more than okay. I am awesome!
translation.zh: 我不止还好 而是好极了！

translation.en: Oh, Jay, are you okay?
translation.zh: 哦 杰伊！你还好吗？

translation.en: Uh... Am I okay?
translation.zh: 我…还好吗？

translation.en: Uh, I'm gonna go with yes. I think.
translation.zh:
-我要说…我想 还好
-哦…

translation.en: Well, you did it, Jay. You broke the record.
translation.zh: 杰伊 你做到了 你打破了纪录！

translation.en: [laughing] What an achievement!
translation.zh:
多么了不起的成绩
虫速纪录被打破了！

translation.en: The bug speed record smashed! How does it feel, Jay?
translation.zh:
多么了不起的成绩
虫速纪录被打破了！ 杰伊 感觉怎么样？

translation.en: Wait. What did I smash?
translation.zh: 等等…我打破了什么？

translation.en: Who is Jay? And, uh, who are all of you?
translation.zh: 杰伊是谁？还有…你们都是谁？

translation.en: Uh, Dr. Robert, care to comment on Jay's memory loss?
translation.zh: 罗伯特医生 想对杰伊的失忆发表一下看法吗？

translation.en: Well, uh, yes.
translation.zh: 好的 我查明了杰伊是怎么回事

translation.en: I've discovered what is wrong with Jay, and it is nothing.
translation.zh: 好的 我查明了杰伊是怎么回事 就是… 什么事也没有

translation.en: [gasps] You heard it here first! It's... Wait. What?
translation.zh:
你在这儿第一次听到这种说法
就是…等等 什么？

translation.en: At least nothing physically wrong.
translation.zh: 至少没有身体上的问题

translation.en: All we can really do is wait and hope his memory returns.
translation.zh:
我们所能做的就是等
希望他的记忆恢复

translation.en: Oh, I beg to differ, Mr. Doctor.
translation.zh: 医生先生 我有不同意见！

translation.en: There is something we can do. [gasps] Make sure the world reads all about it.
translation.zh:
我们有可以做的事情…
要让全世界都了解到这个事！

translation.en: There it is. The first edition of the Yardian newspaper.
translation.zh: 好了 《雅迪安报》第一版

translation.en: Hot off the presses!
translation.zh: 新鲜出炉

translation.en: Ugh. Hey, a simple "no, thanks" will do.
translation.zh: 嘿！简单说句“不要 谢谢”就好！

translation.en: Oh, my. Poor Jay.
translation.zh: 哦 天呐 可怜的杰伊

translation.en: So I live here?
translation.zh: 这么说 我… 住在这儿？

translation.en: You really don't remember, Jay?
translation.zh: 杰伊 你真的不记得了吗？

translation.en: Oh, you're talking to me? Sorry, Budge.
translation.zh: 哦 你在跟我说话？抱歉 巴奇

translation.en: My name is Buzz.
translation.zh: 我叫巴兹！

translation.en: That's what I said. Budge.
translation.zh: 我就是这么说的呀 巴奇

translation.en: [Kumi] Surely, this will bring something back.
translation.zh:
-相信这个会勾起一些记忆吧？
-这是你的滑板

translation.en: It's your skateboard. You do all sorts of, um, crazy tricks on it.
translation.zh:
-相信这个会勾起一些记忆吧？
-这是你的滑板 你能在上面玩…各种疯狂的花样

translation.en: Uh, crazy like that?
translation.zh: 像这种的疯狂？

translation.en: No, much crazier.
translation.zh: 不 别这疯狂多了

translation.en: Jay, Jay, I know you're in there somewhere, old friend.
translation.zh:
杰伊 我知道原来的你肯定在里面
老朋友！如果你能听到我说的话

translation.en: [gasps`] If you can hear me, blink twice.
translation.zh:
杰伊 我知道原来的你肯定在里面
老朋友！如果你能听到我说的话 眨两下眼睛！

translation.en: Uh, but I can speak.
translation.zh: 但我会说话

translation.en: [sobbing] No, it's no use! He's gone for good!
translation.zh: 没用的 他永远…不见了！

translation.en: [clears throat] Look, I'm real sorry about your friend. If I knew how to get him back, I would.
translation.zh:
听着 很遗憾你朋友不见了 我要是
知道怎么把他找回来 我会找的

translation.en: Oh, maybe she will know.
translation.zh: 也许她会知道

translation.en: Lucy!
translation.zh: 露西！

translation.en: What in the world are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你怎么来了？

translation.en: -Well, I read your newspaper, Walter. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 沃尔特 我看了你的报纸

translation.en: Uh, are you sure that's me?
translation.zh: 你确定这就是我？

translation.en: Ah! Of course, it's you. It's in the news, after all.
translation.zh: 当然是你了 毕竟都出现在新闻上了

translation.en: Ah, I'm just a humble news slug.
translation.zh: 我只是个卑微的新闻鼻涕虫

translation.en: I wanna help you, Jay.
translation.zh: 杰伊 我想帮你

translation.en: But these bugs have already tried everything.
translation.zh: 但这些虫子什么都试过了

translation.en: Maybe not everything.
translation.zh: 也许不是什么都试过了

translation.en: [Lucy] This is where we begin.
translation.zh: 我们就是从这儿开始的

translation.en: All you need to do to restore your memory is go through a day in the life.
translation.zh: 要恢复你的记忆 你只需要 经历生命里的一天

translation.en: Jay's life.
translation.zh: 杰伊的一天

translation.en: [sighs] But that's the problem!
translation.zh: 可是问题就在这儿！

translation.en: I don't remember what a Jay-day is.
translation.zh: 我不记得“杰伊的一天”是什么样的

translation.en: [chuckling] Oh, you don't, but they do.
translation.zh: 你不记得 但他们记得

translation.en: We will help you 'member us!
translation.zh: 我们会帮你记起我们！

translation.en: Oh, uh, I guess it's worth a try!
translation.zh: 我想这值得一试

translation.en: Do you remember anything?
translation.zh: 你记起什么了吗？

translation.en: Did it work? Do you remember who you are?
translation.zh: 管用了吗？你记起来自己是谁了吗？

translation.en: [stammering] Uh, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我… 抱歉 我认识你吗？

translation.en: Do I know you?
translation.zh: 抱歉 我认识你吗？

translation.en: I'm so sorry. I've done all I can.
translation.zh: 很抱歉 我能做的都做了

translation.en: Let's sleep on it. He might be better in the morning.
translation.zh:
我们明天再说吧
他也许明早会好一点

translation.en: [grunting] Good morning, bugs!
translation.zh: 虫子们 早上好！

translation.en: -[all gasp] -You remember us?
translation.zh: 你记了我们了？

translation.en: Uh, it's, um, uh, Barbs, right?
translation.zh: 你是…巴奇 对吧？

translation.en: [panting] Jay! Not again!
translation.zh:
杰伊？ -怎么又被砸了？
-你没事吧？

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh:
-怎么又被砸了？
-你没事吧？

translation.en: Oh. [chuckles] Yeah, Walter, just a bit of Jaction.
translation.zh: 没事 沃尔特 只是有点杰动！

translation.en: [gasps] He... He knows my name.
translation.zh: 他…他知道我的名字！

translation.en: [grunts] Sure. Why wouldn't I?
translation.zh: 当然了 我怎么会不记得？

translation.en: And what exactly did you mean by, uh, "Jaction"?
translation.zh: 你说“杰动”到底是什么意思？

translation.en: [chuckles] You know, Jay plus action.
translation.zh: 杰伊加行动！

translation.en: Uh, bugs, did I miss something?
translation.zh: 虫子们 我错过了什么吗？

translation.en: Oh, yeah, um, you lost your memories when you broke the bug speed record.
translation.zh:
是的 你失忆了
但你打破了虫速纪录！

translation.en: I did?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: Wait, I broke the bug speed record?
translation.zh: 等等 我打破了虫速纪录？

translation.en: You, uh, don't remember that?
translation.zh: 你不记得这个了？

translation.en: Uh-uh. And you know what that means?
translation.zh: 你知道这意味着什么吗？

translation.en: We have to do it all over again!
translation.zh: 我们得重新再来一次！

translation.en: It's Jaction time!
translation.zh: 现在是杰动时间！

translation.en: Just another day in the life.
translation.zh: 只是生命中的又一天

translation.en: [man] Oh, battery's running out.
translation.zh:
哦 电池就要用完了
茱莉亚 还有什么结束语吗？

translation.en: Any closing remarks, Julia? Something to remember this day by?
translation.zh:
哦 电池就要用完了
茱莉亚 还有什么结束语吗？ 今天值得记住的东西
